description: Benchmarking tool to measure Stratum V2 and Stratum (V1) protocol performances in different contexts

targets.expr: sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.4", dst="10.5.0.7"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.2", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.4", dst!="10.5.0.5"}[20s]))
sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.4", src="10.5.0.7"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.2", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.4", src!="10.5.0.5"}[20s]))

title: SRI benchmarking tool
